titles.title: A resolution honoring the work of the United Service Organizations and congratulating the United Service Organizations on the sending of their 2 millionth troop care package.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 9/21/2010--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the work of the United Service Organizations (USO) in supporting the members of the U.S. Armed Forces around the world.Congratulates the USO on sending their 2 millionth troop care package.
